responses: Yes, the Information Technology department is accredited by NBA.

responses: The department consists of several laboratories, including CASE TOOLS Lab, DBMS Lab, FOSS Lab, MPMC Lab, WiFi Lab, R&D Lab, and Networks Lab.

The department consists of several laboratories, including CASE TOOLS Lab, DBMS Lab, FOSS Lab, MPMC Lab, WiFi Lab, R&D Lab, and Networks Lab and also equipped with computers, headphones, web cameras, and a library with a collection of over 1300 books.

patterns: What is the vision of the Department of Information Technology?
Can you tell me about the IT department's vision?
responses: To emerge as a center of excellence through innovative technical education and research in Information Technology.

patterns: What is the mission of the Department of Information Technology?
Can you Tell me the IT department's mission?
responses: To produce competent Information Technology professionals to face the industrial and societal challenges by imparting quality education with ethical values.

patterns: Have the IT students achieved anything notable?
Can you tell me about the achievements of the IT students?
Are there any remarkable accomplishments by the IT students?
Have the IT students received any awards or recognition?
Tell me about the achievements of the IT students in the department.
responses: Our students have excelled in their academic pursuits, with 53 University Rank Holders.
Our students have participated in and won prizes in various national and international events held in other colleges.
Many of our students have successfully completed remote project mentoring programs in reputed organizations.
The department organizes symposiums, national/international conferences, project exhibitions, workshops, and seminars to provide students with technical exposure.

Students have had the opportunity to visit industry organizations like ISRO, BSNL, Tata Consultancy Services, and more, and engage in industrial projects with companies such as InfoFace and Honeywell Technology Solutions.

patterns: What are the program-specific outcomes of the IT department?

Tell me about the program-specific outcomes of the IT department.

Explain the goals of the IT department's programs.
responses: The department has the following program-specific outcomes (PSOs) To Create a better learning environment in line with technological advancements research progress. and To Provide industry exposure through research and consultancy in Information and Communication Technologies.

patterns: What are the IT program educational objectives of the department?
Tell me about the PEOs of the IT department.
What are the goals of the IT department's programs?
Explain the objectives of the IT department's programs.
responses:
The department has the following program educational objectives (PEOs) To Excel in industrial or graduate work in Information Technology and multi-disciplinary environments and To Adapt to ever-changing technologies by applying engineering principles.
3. Practice professionalism, conforming to ethical values, teamwork, and leadership.

patterns: What are the program outcomes in the IT department?
Can you tell me about the outcomes of the IT program?
What skills and knowledge are covered by the IT program outcomes?
responses: The IT program outcomes (POs) include: engineering knowledge, problem analysis, design/development of solutions, investigations of complex problems, modern tool usage, societal impact assessment, environment and sustainability awareness, ethical practices, teamwork, effective communication, project management, and lifelong learning.

patterns: When was the department CS established?
How did the CS department start?
Tell me about the CS department's beginnings.
responses: The department of Computer Science and Engineering was established in 1997.
The department started its journey in 1997 with the aim of providing quality education in computer science and engineering.
In 1997, the department came into existence, laying the foundation for its contributions in the field of computer science and engineering.
Since its establishment in 1997, the department has grown and become a renowned institution in the field of computer science and engineering.

patterns: Is the CS department accredited by any authority?
Can you provide information about the CS department's accreditation?
Has the CS department received any accreditation?
responses: Yes, the CS department is accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).
The CS department has undergone accreditation by NBA, ensuring the quality and standards of the department.
The CS department holds accreditation from NBA, signifying its compliance with industry requirements.

patterns: When was the CS department first accredited?
Has the accreditation of the CS department been renewed?
Can you provide details about the CS department's accreditation history?
responses: The CS department was first accredited in 2007 by NBA.
The CS department's accreditation has been renewed multiple times, with the latest renewal in 2019.
The CS department's accreditation status is periodically reviewed and renewed to maintain its quality standards.

patterns: How long is the accreditation status of the CS department valid for?
Till when is the CS department's accreditation valid?
Can you tell me the validity period of the CS department's accreditation?
responses: The accreditation status granted to the CS department is valid until 30.06.2022.
The CS department's accreditation remains valid until the specified date of 30.06.2022.
The accreditation of the CS department is valid for the current cycle until 2022.

patterns: What facilities are available in the department?
Can you tell me about the facilities provided in the department?
What are the resources available in the department?
responses: The department provides a range of facilities to enhance the learning experience of students and faculty members.
Our facilities include competent and experienced faculty members, with several holding doctorates and recognized research supervisors.
We have well-equipped laboratories, including Programming and Data Structures Laboratory, Advanced Computing Laboratory, Software Development and Simulation Laboratory, and Project Laboratory.
Additionally, we have a dedicated Research Laboratory for faculty members and students involved in research and consultancy.
The department boasts a well-stocked library, an exclusive seminar hall for technical events, and a Research Reading Hall for research scholars.
All our classrooms are equipped with smart teaching aids to support effective learning.

patterns: What is the CS department's vision?
Tell me about the CS department's vision.
responses: Our vision is to evolve in Computer Science & Engineering through sustainable technical education and innovative research, fostering competent professionals to serve and lead society.

patterns: What is the CS department's mission?
Tell me about the CS department's mission.
responses: Our mission is to provide demand-based proficient education, promote continuous learning through industry institution interaction, and cultivate professionalism, ethics, and integrity of character for positive contributions to society.

patterns: What are the CS Program Educational Objectives?
Tell me about the CS program educational objectives.
responses: The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) of the Computer Science and Engineering program are to contribute effectively to society by applying principles of the field, sustain as competent professionals through career advancement and innovation, and build professionalism, teamwork, effective communication, ethical values, and leadership qualities.

patterns: CS Program specific outcomes
Tell me about the CS Program specific outcomes
responses: The Program Specific Outcomes (PSOs) of our Computer Science and Engineering program include the ability to apply analytical, design, and implementation skills to solve scientific and business applications related to algorithms, computer systems, networks, security, data analytics, and artificial intelligence. Additionally, students will have the ability to continuously update their knowledge in areas such as virtualization, mobile application development, data visualization, machine learning, and technologies like storage, computing, and communication to meet industry requirements.

patterns: Tell me about the CS placement details
What are the CS placement statistics?
Can you provide information on CS placements?
responses: The placement details for the Computer Science and Engineering Department in recent years are as follows: From 2018 to 2022, out of a total of 103 final year students, 85 were placed in companies or government sectors, with 5 students opting for higher studies and none becoming entrepreneurs. Similar trends were observed in previous years, with varying numbers of students being placed, pursuing higher studies, and venturing into entrepreneurship. These statistics reflect the department's commitment to facilitating successful career opportunities and academic pursuits for its students.

patterns: Provide the count and names of companies that recruited students from the Previous IT batch
How many students were placed and in which companies for the Previous IT batch?
List the companies that recruited students from the Previous IT batch
responses: A total of 19 students were placed in various companies for the 2019-2023 batch. The companies include ZOHO Corporation Pvt., Ltd., Aptean India Pvt., Ltd., TCS, Data Pattern India Pvt., Ltd., Lucid Imaging, Recruit NXT, Shiash Info Solutions Pvt., Ltd., SMI Info Solutions, SOLARTIS, Futurus, Great Innovus, Solver Minds, Aakro Development Pvt., Ltd., Slusby Technologies Pvt., Ltd., and Mphasis.

patterns: Tell me about B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science

responses: The B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science offers a comprehensive curriculum focusing on computation, algorithms, programming languages, computer hardware, and problem-solving. It prepares students to build smart machines using cutting-edge technologies and meet the increasing global demand for AI & DS professionals.
